definition: road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)
subdistrict office/neighborhood official/an official who works with local residents to report to higher government authorities

sentences.english: This initiative helped improve registration of births and deaths at the subdistrict level.
sentences.chinese: 這一舉措幫助改善了街道一級的出生和死亡登記。

sentences.english: Haitian woman crosses a street of Port-au-Prince February 1, 2006.
sentences.chinese: 穿過海地太子港街道的婦女。

sentences.english: In less than an hour the Cadillac rolled into the street of French Hospital.
sentences.chinese: 不到一小時後，卡迪拉克開進了法國醫院街道。

sentences.english: Sporadic gunfire from insurgents down the main road flies harmlessly overhead.
sentences.chinese: 暴亂分子零星的炮火聲在主街道上空迴盪。

sentences.english: We walk around the neighborhood. We learn street names and addresses.
sentences.chinese: 我們在家附近散步，我們學習街道的名字和地址。

sentences.english: This is the busiest street in the city. It‘s the commercial and cultural center here.
sentences.chinese: 這是這兒最繁華的街道，是本市的商業和文化中心。

sentences.english: Port street layout can be traced to the 16th century hero stabbed in Hong Kong was first built.
sentences.chinese: 港口街道佈局可追搠到16世紀英雄港初建時。

sentences.english: Ithas a street like many others.
sentences.chinese: 這條街和其他許多街道一樣。

sentences.english: The quiet streets stretched out on either side like the arms of a skeleton.
sentences.chinese: 靜靜的街道從兩旁伸出來，像骷髏伸着枯臂。

sentences.english: Above, a congested street in Lagos sprawls to the horizon.
sentences.chinese: 上圖爲拉各斯一條擁擠的街道向地平線延展。

sentences.english: The villagers rushed down the street. Lorian was lost in the midst of them.
sentences.chinese: 村民們沿着街道向前湧去，洛裏安也消失在人羣中。

sentences.english: He wanted the music to sound like the streets of Chagall's neighborhood in Russia.
sentences.chinese: 他想要的音樂聽起來像夏加爾在俄羅斯附近的街道。
佈滿殘骸的街道非常危險。

sentences.english: The water swamped the parks and the streets.
In addition, streets adjacent to the taxpayer-subsidized complex will be closed.
sentences.chinese: 此外，由納稅者補助的聯合體附近的街道也將關閉。

sentences.english: The road is lonely in its crown, for it is not loved.
sentences.chinese: 熙來攘往的街道最是寂寞，因爲它不被人所愛。

definition: Lao Cai, Vietnam/Laokai or Laukkai, Burma (Myanmar)
road or pavement laid with flagstones
